instruction: As a financial advisor, please provide your client with an update on the current trends in the ABS market and potential impact on lending and borrowing in the near future.
output:
Dear client, 

I would like to provide you with an update on the current trends in the asset-backed securities (ABS) market. Recent reports suggest that the ABS market may continue to grow in 2022, along with potential growth in the U.S. economy. Especially, sectors most affected by the pandemic, such as travel and leisure, may see significant growth in the upcoming year. 

However, it is worth noting that the recent rates sell-off, driven by Federal Reserve tightening policies, has resulted in a moderate credit widening in the corporate and securitization credit markets. Many are monitoring to see whether this will result in further widening of these markets and affect the willingness of lenders to lend and consumers' ability to borrow.

As we move forward, our team will stay apprised of these market trends and developments and will keep you informed. As always, please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns. 

Best Regards, 
[Your Name]
